tool_description: This API scrapes the most recent F1 news articles from, the official F1 website, Sky F1, BBC F1, WTF1, and Autosport. More may be added in the future...
name: F1 Latest News
title: F1 Latest News

api_list.name: News from individual source
api_list.description:
With this endpoint you can specify the source of the articles you wish to get
/news/f1 for example, or any of the other 4: skyf1, BBCF1, WTF1, autosport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/f1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://f1-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "f1-latest-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET recent F1 news from all sources
api_list.description: This endpoint returns back recent articles from all sources
